alert.note: Alert for Baker; Hamilton; Northern Columbia; Southern Columbia; Suwannee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 10 at 7:56PM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...GUSTY SHOWERS ALONG THE COLD FRONT WILL IMPACT COLUMBIA...HAMILTON... NORTHWESTERN BAKER...SUWANNEE...SOUTHEASTERN COFFEE...PIERCE... ECHOLS...WEST CENTRAL BRANTLEY...CLINCH...ATKINSON...WARE...BACON... JEFF DAVIS AND APPLING COUNTIES THROUGH 900 PM EST... At 755 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking gusty showers along a the cold front extending from 6 miles northeast of Lumber City to 10 miles southeast of Perry. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Waycross, Lake City, Douglas, Live Oak, Jasper, Baxley, Hazlehurst, Alma, Blackshear, and Homerville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Baker; Hamilton; Northern Columbia; Southern Columbia; Suwannee
